* BTTOLD will be burned once swapped. Swapping BTT for BTTOLD is not allowed.
  • What's the exchange rate?
    • 1 BTTOLD = 1,000 BTT
  • What are the token addresses?
    • BTTOLD: ID:1002000
    BTT contract address: TAFjULxiVgT4qWk6UZwjqwZXTSaGaqnVp4
  • What can I do with the swapped BTT tokens?
    • BTT can be brought onto BitTorrent Chain via  BitTorrent Bridge  and then be used to pay for gas fees and participate in projects as a native token.

    • Go to the website to learn more
